attributes.action: No Deal should be made with EU, if it means keeping freedom of movement.
attributes.additional_details: British people need to be listened to.
attributes.background: T.May the UK pm met EU leaders and suggests that for the UK to have access to the single market to trade with,  we will have to keep the rule of free movement of EU citizens. The main reason Brexit was voted for was to stop free movement and immigration to the UK, or at least to seriously limit it.
